storyInfo: Anastasio leads the raid on the pirate camp. Juana lets Thorns go, but he returns when he sees the light from the fire in the distance.

attributes.content: (Whisper) I can't believe she'd let us leave... I thought for sure we'd be tied up and handed over to the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Whisper) Shh...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I know no amount of apologies will make up for your loss.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I suppose this is the end, Isidro.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You needn't worry. I don't blame you. It's not your fault. I accepted the consequences when I made my choice.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I know it was you who bore the brunt of your crew's wrath for us, and I know it was you who saved Pascuala's life.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: ...Maybe you could come with us.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You would certainly be in grave danger if you stay, señora.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Go. Weren't you discussing how you'd escape earlier? Here's your chance.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I'm the leader of the fleet. I won't abandon my crew. This was my oath to Cruz, and one which I will never turn my back on.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Señora Juana... there's something I need to return to you.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You can keep the clothes and the sword. Consider it payment for your troubles.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: No, not that.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: What else is there?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The young man reaches into his pocket, but suddenly stops. He lets out a slow breath...
And takes out the object.
The compass? No...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I... I don't understand. If it's undamaged, then what is that debris in the lab?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: If you haven't been repairing the compass, then what have you been doing?!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Answer me!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The destroyed compass was a replica. I never touched the original.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Whew...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What?! How come no one ever told me? When'd you make the switch?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: I never told anyone.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I don't understand. Why?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The Corazonix in the compass was far more complex than I expected. If I'm unable to replicate it perfectly, that means I haven't understood its true nature.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: In which case, attempting to manipulate the actual Corazonix could only lead to failure.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: But I couldn't afford to fail. Your hopes, the future of the fleet, the fates of Elysium and Pascuala... all of that was on my shoulders.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: So if I was doomed to fail, I thought I should at least limit the damage.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: That's why I tried to replicate the Corazonix. If I proved incapable of understanding it, at least you could keep the original and find a better alchemist.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I left some of the materials you gave me behind for the fleet as well.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I'm sorry. I tried.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Isidro... is this your idea of giving it your all?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The chance of failure was at least 87%... This was the safest way I could think of.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Are you that afraid of failure? Even if the chance of success were one in ten thousand, I would have wagered everything on it.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: That's not experimentation. That's gambling.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Hah... Have you ever considered that the odds of getting a second chance might be even lower?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Tell me, is life a gamble, or an experiment?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Weedy's on her way to pick me up. Are you coming with us?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...My journey is not yet over.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I will continue.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: What about you, Pascuala?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Come with me. I can find a way to get you out of here, at least...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Alright... Take care, Isidro.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Take care.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You too. Both of you.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Señor Silver.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: You're willing to stay. Good, very good...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Have you forgotten? I've got a bad leg. Can't go.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: ...No, I haven't. You were injured during the second raid, correct?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: See, you have forgotten. It happened on the day of the execution. You treated the wound yourself, but it ended up infected anyway.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: If... hypothetically... if I were a better doctor and fixed your leg then, would you have come with us now?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: What were the two of you discussing? It is time.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Señor Anastasio...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: It is an honor working with you.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Where were you, señora?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: ...Saw the kids off.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I did what you told me to.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: ...Take the crew and Nene. Lie low in the Salt Flat for a few days.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I can't leave you here by yourself.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: This is an order, Teach.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Under the moon, Isidro walks by himself through the Salt Flat, leaving behind a trail of lonely footprints.
He does not know how long he has walked. The entire night, probably.
He feels like he has let a lot of people down, but does not know what he did wrong.
Suddenly, he feels lonely and wishes he were with a friend. Then he realizes he just bid farewell to Elysium.
Perhaps Weedy has already found him. Their mission would have come to a close after confirming he was safe.
Perhaps they are discussing the journey out of the Flat and their next mission even now. As for him, he will continue his journey, alone.
Nothing wrong with that. No attachments, no responsibility.
*yawn*
attributes.name: Tired Sailor

attributes.content: Shouldn't have had those extra swigs of saltfin garum...
attributes.name: Tired Sailor

attributes.content: Ugh—!
attributes.name: Tired Sailor

attributes.content: The guards have been eliminated. Inform the Alguacil that the intel is good.
attributes.name: Merciless Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Prepare to advance.
attributes.name: Merciless Warrior Priest

attributes.content: You work fast, Javier.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...You're alone.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: As you can see.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You shouldn't have been left unguarded...
attributes.name: Javier
Juana
attributes.content: Maybe because the one who should have been protecting me is standing before me now.

attributes.name: Juana
attributes.content: Pointing the blade I made for him at me.
Go on. Kill me, and the fleet is yours.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana is in our custody. Keep an eye on her, but don't let her get hurt.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: ...What a joke.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: How did you find this place...? Which finshit sold us out?!
attributes.name: Angry Sailor

attributes.content: Even now you think of vengeance? Meet your end, villain!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Gah—!
attributes.name: Angry Sailor

attributes.content: What of the compass? Have you learned anything?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Nothing, Señor Alguacil. It's all rank-and-file thugs who can hardly string two sentences together.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: We won't find anything unless we go deeper into their base.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Do not stop without my direct command. Everything here must be cleansed with fire.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: There is no reason to allow such tools of sin to continue to exist.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Sir!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: A noise rouses Isidro from his musings and causes him to halt his steps.
He turns around and sees the dark night lit up on the horizon.
That's...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It is the light of a raging fire...
No...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: In the direction of the fleet.
How could it...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Isidro steps forward without hesitation.
It is a decision made not with reason, but pure impulse.
He runs as if his life depends on it, retracing his old set of footprints, towards the direction that he came from.
That same set of footprints is no longer lonely.
Don't bother searching. You won't find it.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: The sailors told me that the kid screwed up. The compass was wrecked. It'd be of no use even if you found it.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Do not think to presume whether it is of use to me or not, bandit.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah, perdón.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: I have safeguarded the compass for nearly a decade, and slain all who reached for it...
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Even if it has become dust, I must see this dust with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Where is your leader?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: We had a deal. Juana will be spared.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: And how does your agreement with Silver concern me?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Surely the woman fled with the compass, yes? This tale of alchemical failure a ruse?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: A lie... to protect a woman, for the sake of your own desires? You, too, ought to be cleansed—
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: I'm not lying. Juana doesn't have the compass. Whatever's left of it is of no use to her.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: It's the alchemist and his lab you should be looking for.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: And where might that be?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Second tent in the back row. There's a secret door leading to the lab.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: ...More lies.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Do not make me cut you down where you stand.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: On the ground! Don't move a muscle!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: I-Is it true? We'll all get pardoned if you find the compass?
attributes.name: Desperate Sailor

attributes.content: Are we gonna get a lighter punishment if we don't resist?
attributes.name: Desperate Sailor

attributes.content: Fools.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Desperate Sailor
